content: That's a great idea about creating a playlist with classical music. I've been listening to a lot of podcasts lately, especially "My Favorite Murder", and I think a change of pace would be nice. I'll make sure to create a playlist that fits the royal theme. Speaking of themes, do you have any ideas for decorations that would fit a winter wonderland theme? I was thinking of hosting the dinner party on December 22nd, and I want to make sure the decor matches the season.
